ygData.subject: Re: chipped bone rod
ygData.msgSnippet: ... they fixed that and they now sell for like 15 plat in stores. ... it doesnt find someone s body specifically, it find the nearest corpse, i believe (this
ygData.messageBody:
>>
>
>They sell in shops for 6k plat or so but if you try and sell them there you
>only get offered a few plat i think.

they fixed that and they now sell for like 15 plat in stores.

>They are corpse retrieval tools but last night on Ec'i I got a message from
>someone who had bouhgt one and couldn't figure out how to make it work. He
>had tried right and left clicking, and having it in his hand slot. When I
>zoned he was about to try with the person in his group and targetted. So
>unless you have palt to spare I would hold off.
>

it doesnt find someone's body specifically, it find the nearest corpse, i
believe (this is what i was told).

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 18th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
